event description: [{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "Final day of a prolonged heat wave; temperatures remained above 40 °C with 41.8 °C measured at an airport in the region, marking the last day of a heat wave that had begun in late July"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Persistent heavy rainfall caused flooding in countries across the Sahel; inundation increased in wetlands and heavy rain led to flooding in multiple areas"}, {"region": "South of Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rain and strong winds battered the southwestern part of the region, causing casualties and damage"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "A new heat wave intensified; an airport in the region registered 42.2 °C during the second heat wave of the month"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Abnormal dryness persisted in parts of the Gulf of Guinea, with drought conditions emerging due to below‑average rainfall since June"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall triggered flooding across the central Sahel, causing damage and raising flood risk in multiple communities"}]

[{"region": "East Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall caused flooding and landslides in the Horn of Africa, leading to casualties and damage"}, {"region": "South of Africa", "descrpition": "Strong winds and heavy rain hit the southwestern part of the region, causing casualties and damage, while less intense flooding occurred further north"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Ongoing abnormal dryness and drought persisted in the eastern Gulf of Guinea region due to rainfall deficits"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "The second August heat wave continued with temperatures above 40 °C across southwestern and central parts of the region"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall caused flooding and damage across the central Sahel, including parts of the Gulf of Guinea and inland areas"}, {"region": "East Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall continued to produce flooding and landslides across the Horn of Africa, with risk of further inundation"}]

[{"region": "North America (Southeast)", "descrpition": "Tropical system Debby made landfall as a Category 1 hurricane along the Gulf coast, bringing heavy rain, flooding and strong winds"}, {"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "The August heat wave persisted with temperatures well above 40 °C across the region"}, {"region": "Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall caused flooding across the Horn and Sahel regions, while abnormal dryness persisted around the Gulf of Guinea"}]

[{"region": "North America (Arctic)", "descrpition": "A record high temperature of 89 °F (31.7 °C) was measured at a station north of 70°N latitude, breaking the previous record and marking the highest temperature ever recorded in that part of the Arctic"}, {"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "The heat wave continued, with temperatures over 40 °C across the region"}, {"region": "East Africa", "descrpition": "Flooding and landslides persisted in the Horn of Africa as heavy rain and strong winds continued"}]

[{"region": "South of Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rain and strong winds in the southwestern part of the region led to casualties and widespread damage"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Abnormal dryness persisted in the eastern parts of the Gulf of Guinea region, while adjacent areas continued to experience flooding due to heavy rainfall"}, {"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "High temperatures and persistent heat wave conditions continued across the region"}]

[{"region": "North America (Southeast)", "descrpition": "Tropical system Debby made a second landfall as a tropical storm along the Atlantic coast, bringing heavy rain and strong winds"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall continued to cause flooding and damage across the Sahel, with forecasted rain threatening more floods"}, {"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "The heat wave persisted, with temperatures exceeding 40 °C across the southwestern and Mediterranean parts of the region"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "Extreme temperatures persisted with maximums over 40 °C; the heat wave continued to intensify"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Abnormal dryness and drought conditions continued in the eastern Gulf of Guinea region"}, {"region": "East Africa", "descrpition": "Flooding and landslides continued as heavy rain persisted across the Horn of Africa"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "The heat wave peaked with temperatures reaching 43.1 °C in the northern part of the region and 42 °C in the southwestern Mediterranean"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall caused flooding across the western Sahel and coastal areas"}, {"region": "North Africa", "descrpition": "Hot conditions were forecast across the northern part of the region, with temperatures well above normal"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "The heat wave continued; a station in the northern part of the region recorded 42.9 °C and widespread high temperatures were observed"}, {"region": "Central Europe", "descrpition": "Heat extended northward, with the highest temperature of 36.5 °C observed in the western part of the region during the heat wave"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall and risk of flooding persisted along the western coast and Sahel"}]

[{"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "Tropical Storm Maria reached the northern region of an island nation, delivering torrential rain, disrupting flights and rail services and prompting evacuations due to mudslide and flood warnings"}, {"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "Meteorological authorities classified a disturbance over the western Pacific as Tropical Storm Ampil; the system was named and began intensifying"}, {"region": "Central Europe", "descrpition": "Hot air from the Southern Europe heat wave reached the region, bringing widespread maximum temperatures above 35 °C in western areas"}]

[{"region": "Central Europe", "descrpition": "A severe thunderstorm in the southwestern part of the region produced nearly 90 mm of rain in a few hours; measuring stations recorded about 87–90 mm, causing flash flooding and a 100-year flood on a small river"}, {"region": "Central Europe", "descrpition": "Heat continued with high overnight temperatures; the highest daytime temperature of 36.5 °C was observed in the western part of the region during the heat wave"}, {"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "Rainfall records were set; a station in the north-central part of the region accumulated 43.3 l/m² of rain"}]

[{"region": "Central Europe", "descrpition": "The heat wave subsided as cooler air arrived, but organized convective storms produced hail, heavy rain and flash flooding in the southern part of the region; water levels on a small river fell after peaking at 100-year flood levels"}, {"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "A brief cool episode began, with temperatures dropping below average in many regions"}, {"region": "East Africa", "descrpition": "Flooding persisted across the Horn of Africa, and landslides continued; the risk of further inundation remained high"}]

[{"region": "Western Mediterranean (Southern Europe)", "descrpition": "A cold-upper-level low brought intense thunderstorms; a coastal island station recorded 93.2 l/m² of rain in 24 hours"}, {"region": "Central Europe", "descrpition": "Convective storms continued but were less severe; cooler air spread eastward across the region, though temperatures remained above average"}, {"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "Typhoon Ampil intensified and was upgraded to a typhoon; it moved northward and began to reach Category 4 intensity with sustained winds around 155 km/h"}]

[{"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "Typhoon Ampil peaked at Category 4-equivalent strength with one-minute sustained winds of 215 km/h and a central pressure of 950 hPa while approaching the region"}, {"region": "Central Europe", "descrpition": "The ridge driving the heat wave weakened as a trough moved in; convective storms earlier in the week had caused large hail and flash flooding in the southern part of the region"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall continued to cause flooding across the Sahel, while hot conditions persisted in the northern part of the region"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "A warm episode (17–24 August) began, with temperatures above normal across the region though not reaching heat wave thresholds"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Abnormal dryness persisted in the eastern Gulf of Guinea region"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Heavy rain began in the Bengal region, setting the stage for severe floods in the coming days"}]

[{"region": "North America (Northeast)", "descrpition": "A slow-moving frontal system caused extreme rainfall of more than 10 inches (≈254 mm); flash flood emergencies were issued for parts of the region"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Cloudbursts and torrential rain continued in the Bengal region, raising river levels and flooding many districts"}, {"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "Satellites observed very powerful thunderstorms across the Indo-China Peninsula, with intense convection over northern parts of the region"}]

[{"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Severe flooding hit the Bengal region as heavy rain and releases from upstream dams inundated many districts; rivers flowed above danger levels"}, {"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "Monitoring from FY-4B satellites detected powerful thunderstorms across the Indo-China Peninsula as prolonged rain battered the region near the Mekong River"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall continued to cause flooding and damage across coastal and inland areas, while hot conditions persisted in the northern part of the region"}]

[{"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Floodwaters in the Bengal region continued to rise, with river levels staying above danger and communities dealing with inundation"}, {"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "A monsoon trough produced heavy to very heavy rainfall across the Upper Mekong Basin, particularly between 20–22 August"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Abnormal dryness persisted in the eastern Gulf of Guinea region, while heavy rain continued to flood parts of the Sahel"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "A station in the interior recorded 48.2 l/m² of rain, setting a daily August precipitation record"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Flood conditions persisted in the Bengal region with river discharge remaining high and warnings issued for further flooding"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall and flooding continued across the Sahel, while abnormal dryness persisted in nearby areas"}]

[{"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Flooding persisted in the western Sahel and coastal areas, with rivers remaining swollen and the risk of further flooding"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Abnormal dryness and drought conditions continued in the eastern Gulf of Guinea region"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Floodwaters in the Bengal region began to recede in some areas but remained high in others"}]

[{"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Conditions in the Bengal region improved as water levels at some river stations dropped, although significant flooding remained"}, {"region": "North America (South-central)", "descrpition": "A heat wave persisted across the south-central part of the continent, with temperatures forecast to break records later in the month"}, {"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall continued in the Lower Mekong Basin; water levels at a key monitoring station reached the alarm level"}]

[{"region": "Central Pacific", "descrpition": "Rain bands from Hurricane Hone impacted islands in the central Pacific, causing flooding and power outages"}, {"region": "North America (West)", "descrpition": "A high-elevation ski area recorded its first August snowfall since 2004"}, {"region": "North America (Central Plains)", "descrpition": "A heat wave broke an all-time temperature record as a town in the central plains reached 115 °F (46.1 °C)"}]

[{"region": "Central Pacific", "descrpition": "Hurricane Hone continued to affect central Pacific islands with rain bands, flooding and power outages"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "In the Bengal region, floodwaters were still high though some areas saw gradual improvement"}, {"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "The monsoon trough continued to bring heavy rainfall to the Upper Mekong Basin; water levels at key stations remained elevated"}]

[{"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Authorities released large volumes of water from an upstream barrage, worsening floods in downstream districts of the Bengal region"}, {"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "Heavy rain associated with Typhoon Shanshan began affecting the southern part of an island archipelago; rainfall totals since 26 August exceeded 840 mm in some areas"}, {"region": "Central Africa", "descrpition": "The rainy season intensified in the far northern region; heavy rains earlier in August built up to peak floods that would culminate later in the month"}]

[{"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "A landslide triggered by heavy rain killed at least one person in a coastal area near a major city as Typhoon Shanshan approached; authorities issued emergency warnings"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Floodwaters in the Bengal region began to recede slightly as upstream flows diminished"}, {"region": "Central Africa", "descrpition": "In the far northern region, dikes holding back floodwaters weakened under continuous rain; reports warned that peak flooding could occur soon"}]

[{"region": "Central Africa", "descrpition": "In the far northern region, a water-retention dike collapsed, causing severe flooding; towns were inundated during the peak of the floods"}, {"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "Water levels at a key monitoring station along the Mekong River remained at alarm level, with heavy rainfall forecast through the end of the month"}, {"region": "North Africa", "descrpition": "Hot conditions continued across the northern part of the region"}]

[{"region": "East Asia", "descrpition": "Typhoon Shanshan made landfall on the southern tip of a large island with winds around 85 mph (≈137 km/h); more than 100,000 households lost power and rainfall of 400 mm fell within 24 hours"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "The Bengal region observed receding floodwaters as rainfall eased and river flows decreased"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Abnormal dryness continued in the eastern Gulf of Guinea region"}]

[{"region": "Southern Europe", "descrpition": "Intense rainfall in the interior of the region; stations measured 57.2 l/m² and 49.6 l/m², setting precipitation records for August"}, {"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rain continued to cause flooding and damage across the Sahel"}, {"region": "Central Africa", "descrpition": "Heavy rainfall forecast indicated continued risk of flooding in the far northern region as the rainy season persisted"}]

[{"region": "West Africa", "descrpition": "Floods persisted in the Sahel and coastal areas, while abnormal dryness remained in parts of the Gulf of Guinea"}, {"region": "South Asia", "descrpition": "Floodwaters in the Bengal region receded further, and authorities began relief operations"}, {"region": "Southeast Asia", "descrpition": "Water levels along the Mekong River remained elevated; heavy rain continued to affect the northern part of the Lower Mekong Basin"}]
